XML Format: Endpoint-direct321

Raw xml 


<Endpoint xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">
  <id value="direct321"/>
  <meta>
    <profile
             value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/StructureDefinition/vhdir-endpoint"/>
  </meta>
  <text>
    <status value="generated"/>
    <div xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p><b>Generated Narrative with Details</b></p><p><b>identifier</b>: Direct Address = heart@direct.ffhospital.com (USUAL)</p><p><b>status</b>: ACTIVE</p><p><b>connectionType</b>: Direct Project (Details: http://hl7.org/fhir/endpoint-connection-type code direct-project = 'Direct Project', stated as 'Direct Project')</p><p><b>name</b>: Founding Fathers Memorial Hospital Heart and Vascular Institute Direct address</p><p><b>managingOrganization</b>: <a href="http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/Organization/foundingfathers">Founding Fathers Memorial Hospital</a></p><p><b>contact</b>: ph: 202-101-0123(WORK)</p><p><b>period</b>: Nov 19, 2014 --&gt; (ongoing)</p><p><b>payloadType</b>: HL7 CCD Document <span style="background: LightGoldenRodYellow">(Details : {urn:oid:1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.2.3 code 'urn:ihe:pcc:xphr:2007' = 'urn:ihe:pcc:xphr:2007', given as 'HL7 CCD Document'})</span></p><p><b>payloadMimeType</b>: application/hl7-v3+xml</p><p><b>address</b>: <a href="heart@direct.ffhospital.com">heart@direct.ffhospital.com</a></p></div>
  </text>
  <extension
             url="http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/StructureDefinition/endpoint-usecase">
    <extension url="type">
      <valueCodeableConcept>
        <coding>
          <system
                  value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/CodeSystem/codesystem-usecase"/>
          <code value="treatment"/>
          <display value="treatment"/>
        </coding>
      </valueCodeableConcept>
    </extension>
    <extension url="standard">
      <valueUri
                value="http://wiki.directproject.org/file/view/2011-03-09%20PDF%20-%20XDR%20and%20XDM%20for%20Direct%20Messaging%20Specification_FINAL.pdf"/>
    </extension>
  </extension>
  <extension
             url="http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/StructureDefinition/endpoint-rank">
    <valuePositiveInt value="1"/>
  </extension>
  <extension
             url="http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/StructureDefinition/digitalcertificate">
    <extension url="type">
      <valueCoding>
        <system
                value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/CodeSystem/codesystem-digitalcertificate"/>
        <code value="grp"/>
        <display value="Group"/>
      </valueCoding>
    </extension>
    <extension url="use">
      <valueCoding>
        <system
                value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/CodeSystem/codesystem-digitalcertificate"/>
        <code value="signing"/>
        <display value="Signing"/>
      </valueCoding>
    </extension>
    <extension url="use">
      <valueCoding>
        <system
                value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/CodeSystem/codesystem-digitalcertificate"/>
        <code value="encrypt"/>
        <display value="Encryption"/>
      </valueCoding>
    </extension>
    <extension url="certificateStandard">
      <valueCoding>
        <system
                value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/CodeSystem/codesystem-digitalcertificate"/>
        <code value="x.509v3"/>
        <display value="x.509v3"/>
      </valueCoding>
    </extension>
    <extension url="certificate">
      <valueString
                   value="VGhpcyBpcyB0aGUgZGlnaXRhbCBjZXJ0aWZpY2F0ZSBhc3NvY2lhdGVkIHdpdGggdGhlIEZvdW5kaW5nIEZhdGhlcnMgSGVhcnQgYW5kIFZhc2N1bGFyIEluc3RpdHV0ZeKAmXMgRGlyZWN0IGFkZHJlc3MNCg0KLS0tLS1CRUdJTiBQVUJMSUMgS0VZLS0tLS0NCk1JR2ZNQTBHQ1NxR1NJYjNEUUVCQVFVQUE0R05BRENCaVFLQmdRQysrM3RvczN4cTVhSWFKLzZSREd6REZKK2YNCjJNWkxHdHEyZXM5T1NRdEpzYU9YNjd6VlI5QnpMZWgwa2pMZ3ZOMC85Q0NxNDdQS3dvQWV4b2R2MXVhanF3YWcNCnBHYlV0NkF5ZHEzeE9LMllhRnkzTDVMMXBHc2NySzJPMXJSd0ExYUpndXdRVjArM0xYNmVwOExBVitkZFVaS3cNCjB4MlRyUkRZUUJFZE52YkFVd0lEQVFBQg0KLS0tLS1FTkQgUFVCTElDIEtFWS0tLS0tDQo="/>

                  value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/CodeSystem/codesystem-digitalcertificate"/>

  </extension>
  <identifier>
    <extension
               url="http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/StructureDefinition/identifier-status">
      <valueCode value="active"/>
    </extension>
    <use value="usual"/>
    <type>
      <text value="Direct Address"/>
    </type>
    <value value="heart@direct.ffhospital.com"/>
    <assigner>
      <display value="Revolutionary Health Information Service Provider"/>

  </identifier>
  <status value="active"/>
  <connectionType>
    <system value="http://hl7.org/fhir/endpoint-connection-type"/>
    <code value="direct-project"/>
    <display value="Direct Project"/>
  </connectionType>
  <name
        value="Founding Fathers Memorial Hospital Heart and Vascular Institute Direct address"/>
  <managingOrganization>
    <reference value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/Organization/foundingfathers"/>
    <display value="Founding Fathers Memorial Hospital"/>
  </managingOrganization>
  <contact>
    <system value="phone"/>
    <value value="202-101-0123"/>
    <use value="work"/>
  </contact>
  <period>
    <start value="2014-11-19"/>
  </period>
  <payloadType>
    <coding>
      <system value="urn:oid:1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.2.3"/>
      <code value="urn:ihe:pcc:xphr:2007"/>
      <display value="HL7 CCD Document"/>
    </coding>
  </payloadType>
  <payloadMimeType value="application/hl7-v3+xml"/>
  <address value="heart@direct.ffhospital.com"/>
</Endpoint>
